dempred.classifier

Class ParameterOptimizer<T extends Datapoint>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dempred.classifier.ParameterOptimizer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<ClassifierInterface<T>>, java.util.Iterator<ClassifierInterface<T>>

    public class ParameterOptimizer<T extends Datapoint>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator<ClassifierInterface<T>>, java.lang.Iterable<ClassifierInterface<T>>
    A utility class used to optimize parameters of a classifier such as the lambda value.

        Parameters:
        classifier - the classifier to be optimized

        resampler - the resampler used to evaluate the error of a parameter
